page.description: Returns name for all months, using current culture settings

argument.name: result
argument.description: Names of months, one per line

argument.name: options
argument.description: (optional) Comma-delimited list of parameter-value expressions, such as: language=cultureCode, short, shortest

page.example:
? international_months() = January February ...
' spanish ? international_months("language=es") = enero febrero ...
